data.actual_result: The emote picker button disappears as of there’s none
data.expected_result: You should be able to use the emote picker button while editing a message
data.short_description: Emote picker button doesn’t shows when you want to edit a message compared to desktop & android
data.steps_to_repro: - Have the app open in a text channel - Send a message - Edit the message - Observe the emote picker button not appearing
